title: Kona Brewing Co
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Brewery produces vegan beers. Has vegan appetizers such as guacamole and hummus, in addition to offering a vegan macadamia nut pesto with some of the menu items. Vegan items are not clearly marked on menu. Vegetarian items can easily be made vegan. Staff is knowledgeable and accommodating when asking for vegan dishes.
